movies.name: Parasite
movies.describe: A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.describe: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: Fight club
movies.describe: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.name: Inception
movies.describe: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
